description: Attaches an incident to an alert.

status.description: The incident status used to check the status of an incident.

priority.description: The incident priority: low, normal, high, urgent, and very low.

toEmail.description: The email address to receive incident notifications.

assignedUser.description: The designated user who is assigned to the incident.

customFields.description: User-customized fields that can include additional information about an incident. Use the Get Incident Custom Fields API to get custom fields of an incident.

attachments.description: Information related to the incident in base64 encoded format.
